padding.description: Controls padding, key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value, 'md' by default
padding.description_zh: 控制内边距、theme.spacing 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认为 'md'

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

shadow.description: Key of theme.shadows or any valid CSS value to set box-shadow, none by default
shadow.description_zh: key，或者任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 box-shadow，默认为 none

withBorder.description: Determines whether the card should have border, border color depends on color scheme, false by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定卡片是否应具有边框，边框颜色取决于配色方案，默认为 false
